titles.title: U.S. Postal Service Opioid and Illicit Drug Strategy Act of 2019
U.S. Postal Service Opioid and Illicit Drug Strategy Act of 2019
A bill to require the Postmaster General to establish a comprehensive organizational strategy to combat the use of the mail in the distribution of illicit drugs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
U.S. Postal Service Opioid and Illicit Drug Strategy Act of 2019
This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to establish a comprehensive organizational strategy to combat the use of the mail in the distribution of illicit drugs.
